metadata.Title: CVE-2012-2093 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
src/common/latex.py in Gajim 0.15 allows local users to overwrite arbitraryfiles via a symlink attack on a temporary latex file, related to theget_tmpfile_name function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2093` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gajim - 1.0.1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gajim package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1-3').
